00077     {return index < vertexList.size() && vertexList[index].valid; }

00081       { return index < elementList.size() &&

00225     struct Vertex {
00226       Vertex( const Vector3D& pos, bool is_fixed )
00227         : coords(pos), midcount(0), fixed(is_fixed), valid(true), byte('\0') {}
00228         
00229       Vertex() : midcount(0), valid(false), byte('\0') {}
00230     
00231       Vector3D coords;                     
00232       std::vector<size_t> adjacencies; 
00233       unsigned midcount;                   
00234       bool fixed;                          
00235       bool slaved;
00236       bool valid;                          
00237       unsigned char byte;                  
00238     };
00239     
00241     struct Element {
00242       std::vector<size_t> connectivity; 
00243       EntityTopology topology;             
00244       Element()
00245           : topology(MIXED)
00246         {}
00247       
00248     };
00249     
00250     std::vector<Vertex> vertexList;     
00251     std::vector<Element> elementList;   
00254     std::vector<size_t> deletedVertexList;
00256     std::vector<size_t> deletedElementList;
00257     
00258     bool haveSlavedFlags;
00259 };
